summary:
Very simple mod that let you see yourself while eating and drinking like
any other npc in game.
To end the eating or drinking animation simply draw your weapons.
descriptionHtml:
See YourSelf Eat and Drink

Description
============

Very simple mod that let you see yourself while eating and drinking like
any other npc in game.
To end the eating or drinking animation simply draw your weapons.

Update 1.1
Disabled eating and drinking animation while player in combat.

Installation
=============
Put data folder in your skyrim folder.


If You like the mod please endorse.

Thank You.

Thanks to liolekas  for video
[Youtube]aMgiYS4kFXM[/Youtube]
author: Praveen
